title: About Me
text:
I’m Karan, a Data Science master’s student based in Bristol.
I enjoy building tools that make life easier — from automation scripts to clean data workflows.



High‑impact AI domains (finance, medical imaging, automation)
Clean code and reproducible project structures
Making technical tools accessible to non‑technical users




I enjoy volleyball, exploring Bristol, and optimising my home tech setup.
